thread.title_full: First trip to London - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: keithmA2519EX
title: First trip to London -
text: We had an excellent five day stay. The room was very clean, the entrance is very bright and lively and the staff was extremely helpful. The hotel is centrally located and right near a train station and a short walk to museums and restaurants. We had a great time! Would definitely stay again and highly recommend it.
